Package by.rozmysl.booking.controllers

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
by.rozmysl.booking.controllers.AdminController
@Controller
public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
The class processes administrator requests, creates the appropriate model, and passes it for display

    • getUserList

      @GetMapping("/admin/allUsers") public java.lang.String getUserList​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The method makes a get request and displays a list of all users on the page
      Parameters:
      model - the following attributes have been added: list of all users
      Returns:
      the allUsers page

    • deleteUser

      @PostMapping("/admin/allUsers") public java.lang.String deleteUser​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.Long userId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String delete)
      The method removes the user from the database
      Parameters:
      userId - user id
      delete - button name
      Returns:
      redirect the allUsers page

    • getReservationList

      @GetMapping("/admin/allReservation") public java.lang.String getReservationList​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The method makes a get request and displays a list of all reservation on the page
      Parameters:
      model - the following attributes have been added: list of all reservations, roomService
      Returns:
      the allReservation page

    • changeReservation

      @PostMapping("/admin/allReservation") public java.lang.String changeReservation​(@RequestParam(name="room",required=false) java.lang.Integer room, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String changeRoom, @RequestParam(name="status",required=false) java.lang.String status, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.Integer reservationId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String delete, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String changeStatus) throws javax.mail.MessagingException, java.io.IOException
      The method makes the following changes to the reservation database: room change, status change, deletion
      Parameters:
      room - room id
      changeRoom - button name
      status - reservation status
      reservationId - reservation id
      delete - button name
      changeStatus - button name
      Returns:
      redirect the allReservation page
      Throws:
      javax.mail.MessagingException - if the message cannot be created
      java.io.IOException - if the invoice cannot be created

      @PostMapping("/admin/allRooms") public java.lang.String changeRoomPrice​(@RequestParam(name="price",required=false) java.lang.Double price, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.Integer roomId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String changePrice, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String delete)

    • changeServices

      @PostMapping("/admin/changeServicesPrice") public java.lang.String changeServices​(@RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String foodId, @RequestParam(name="foodPrice",required=false) java.lang.Double foodPrice, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String changeFoodPrice, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String serviceId, @RequestParam(name="servicePrice",required=false) java.lang.Double servicePrice, @RequestParam(defaultValue="") java.lang.String changeServicePrice)
      The method makes the following changes to the food and additional services database: food price change, services price change
      Parameters:
      foodId - food id
      foodPrice - food price
      changeFoodPrice - button name
      serviceId - service id
      servicePrice - service price

    • inputRoom

      @GetMapping("/admin/addRoom") public java.lang.String inputRoom​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The method makes a get request and displays a form on the page for creating a new room
      Parameters:
      model - the following attributes have been added: a form for creating a new room, list of all type rooms, roomService
      Returns:
      the addRoom page

    • addRoom

      @PostMapping("/admin/addRoom") public java.lang.String addRoom​(@ModelAttribute("formRoom") @Valid @Valid Room formRoom, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The method makes the following changes to the room database: creates a new room, and also checks the correctness of the entered data
      Parameters:
      formRoom - room form
      bindingResult - binding result in the room form
      model - the following attributes have been added: list of all type rooms
      Returns:
      redirect the admin page
